var ESBError = inputMessage.ToObject <dynamic> (); if(context.Instance.IsDebugEnabled){ context.Instance.TraceDebug ("Reading Environment Variables"); } var emailList = context.EnvironmentVariables["DefaultAdminEmailAddressString"]; var emailSender = context.EnvironmentVariables["SmtpSendAddress"]; var sourceID = ESBError.EndpointAddress; var action = ESBError.ESBAction; var creationDate = ESBError.MessageDate; var messageID = ESBError.TransactionID; var emailSubject = string.Format("A Non Schema Compliant Message has arrived on Neo PLM Integration Endpoint: {0} Method: {1}", sourceID, action); var body = new System.Text.StringBuilder(); body.AppendLine(string.Format("A Message {0} arrived on: {1} Method : {2} at {3}. \n", messageID, sourceID, action, creationDate)); body.AppendLine("The message does not comply with the expected message schema. The message is attached, and the issues with the message appear below. \n"); body.AppendLine("The message has been abandoned by the interface."); body.AppendLine ("\r\n"); body.AppendLine (string.Format("Error Details \n")); body.AppendLine (ESBError.ErrorMessage.ToString()); if(context.Instance.IsDebugEnabled){ context.Instance.TraceDebug(string.Format("Sending email '{2}' from {0} to {1}",emailSender,emailList,emailSubject)); } context.Data.SetProperty("smtp", "To", emailList); context.Data.SetProperty("smtp", "From", emailSender); context.Data.SetProperty("smtp", "Subject", emailSubject); context.Data.SetProperty("smtp", "Body", body.ToString()); // Attach the original message as an attachment context.Data.Text = ESBError.OriginalMessage.ToString(); context.Data.SetProperty("smtp", "Filename", "OriginalMessage.xml"); context.Data.SetProperty("smtp", "BodyAsAttachment", true.ToString());
